title: EIPIP Meeting 5 Agenda
body:
## Date and Time

Wednesday, March 11, 2020, at 15:00 UTC

## Location 

Zoom: The link will be shared in the telegram group.
YouTube Recording Link: **TBA**

## Agenda

### 1. Migrating EIP content to ethereum.org - [proposal discussion](https://github.com/ethereum/ethereum-org-website/issues/343#issuecomment-575446111)

### 2. Code of conduct ref. [Ethereum Cat Herders: Code of Conduct](https://github.com/ethereum-cat-herders/PM/blob/master/CODE_OF_CONDUCT.md)

### 3. Progress on [change in EIP status](https://docs.google.com/spreadsheets/d/1KnsLDuVr9F7-vE3aEQFhWmmyktZmMlAMxSSh1Snhm8k/edit#gid=437498933) and repo cleanup
* Brent's [PR](https://github.com/ethereum/EIPs/pull/2551) to change the of status EIP 3  
* EIP in [Final Call](https://docs.google.com/spreadsheets/d/1KnsLDuVr9F7-vE3aEQFhWmmyktZmMlAMxSSh1Snhm8k/edit#gid=586056978)
* Selection [criteria for an EIP editor](https://docs.google.com/spreadsheets/d/1KnsLDuVr9F7-vE3aEQFhWmmyktZmMlAMxSSh1Snhm8k/edit#gid=256309272)
* Change status of [EIP 233](https://eips.ethereum.org/EIPS/eip-233) (Upgrade Meta EIP) and [EIP 2378](https://github.com/MadeofTin/EIPs/blob/d2afe868da9a472a01b9ea21c87e68569b025ed4/EIPS/eip-2378.md) (EFI) from 'Meta' to 'Informational'
* Next step?

### 4. Survey on the EIP process (target audience - core devs)

### 5. Update on proposed changes to EIP 1
* To reduce the dependence on ACD - [PR](https://github.com/ethereum/EIPs/pull/2551) by fubuloubu
* Change "Hard Fork" for "Network Upgrade" - [PR](https://github.com/ethereum/EIPs/pull/2516) by Tim B. 
*  Adding Table of Contents to EIP-1 and a section for Hardforks and the EIP-Centric Model - [PR](https://github.com/ethereum/EIPs/pull/2508/commits/c56e992586b027e45bca0770b545f3407a838a00) by James H.


### 6.  Process documentation
* Adding a section of 'Motivation' to Meta EIP of upgrade (Berlin), also documented in [EIP 233](https://eips.ethereum.org/EIPS/eip-233)
* EIP timeline documentation - to move from draft to accept. 
* Document process to update or revise an existing EIP. Update in text, EIP author, EIP champion, EIP status, etc.

### 7. Review action items from [EIPIP meeting 4](https://github.com/ethereum-cat-herders/EIPIP/blob/master/All%20EIPIP%20Meetings/Meeting%20004.md)

Action Item | Description
-- | --
4.1 | Reach out to Nick Johnson and contributors to update the EIP bot.
4.2 | "Hard fork," "network upgrade" terminology PR to EIP-1 to be merged.
4.3 | James Hancock to split PR defining kinds of network upgrades.
4.4 | Create a guide for EIP champions.
4.5 | Discuss possible Code of Conduct for public Ethereum messaging platforms.
4.6 | Create some resources for developers to create new Ethereum clients (Eth1.x).
4.7 | Update EIP specifying EFI to accepted or final, then change EIP-1 to include EFI.
4.8 | Brent to open PRs updating EIP-3 and EIP-107 status.
4.9 | Create a champions list header, add to EIP-1.
4.10 | Further discuss recommending authors and champions be introduced (background) in the discussion-to conversation linked in EIPs.

### 8. Any Other Business

### 9. Next Call
